text: Ernest Fernand Lévecque (2 September 1852 – 4 July 1947) was a colonial administrator of a number of possessions of the French Colonial Empire. He was born in Beaurieux, Aisne département, France. ==Titles Held== *Assemblée Nationale (Chambre des députés) (20 August 1893 – 31 May 1898). ==References== Category:French colonial governors and administrators Category:Governors of French India Category:People of the French Third Republic Category:1947 deaths Category:1852 births
title: Ernest Fernand Lévecque
